meanings.definition: A strong desire to travel and explore the world.
meanings.sent1: Her wanderlusts led her to plan a trip around the world.
meanings.sent2: Many people feel wanderlusts when they see pictures of exotic places.
meanings.sent3: His wanderlusts were so intense that he started collecting travel brochures as a hobby.
meanings.sent4: The wanderlusts in her heart burned brighter with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The allure of wanderlusts beckoned to her like a siren's song.

meanings.definition: A person who has a strong desire to travel and explore the world.
meanings.sent1: The group of wanderlusts gathered to share their travel stories.
meanings.sent2: She became friends with other wanderlusts who shared her passion for adventure.
meanings.sent3: The wanderlusts in the office always had the best vacation photos to show.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the king of wanderlusts among his friends.
meanings.sent5: In a world full of wanderlusts, she found her tribe.
